title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Go CLI and server that downloads, runs, and serves GGUF models with a built-in model library and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models in a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that wraps Ollama’s local models for use in chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that clones ChatGPT’s interface for local models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous clients with POJO mapping.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem that exposes a fluent interface to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model for private autocomplete.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting pipelines use Ollama models for generation, chat, and embeddings.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, vision, RAG, fine-tuning, and edge deployment.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-stage Dockerfile and compose snippets for CPU/GPU containers.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app wrapping Ollama with markdown rendering and chat history.

title: ollama-model-importer
summary: Python utility that converts HuggingFace safetensors/GGML into GGUF and auto-publishes to Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI sidebar for summarizing notes and answering vault questions.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation that builds Ollama and bundles CUDA drivers for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma for question answering over PDFs.
